Resets the score and counters for missed and caught words to zero so a new game can be started.

run() - Method in class WordPanel
The run method is invoked by the threads when the Start button is clicked and it handles the terminating of the game when all words have dropped as well as the checking and counting of missed words through the Score class methods.
